subject: Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
Alcoholic Beverages
lead_paragraph: Organizers of the Preakness Stakes want a tamer experience on Saturday for the 134th running of the race, meaning fans can no longer bring their own beverages to the infield.
snippet: Organizers of the Preakness Stakes want a tamer experience on Saturday for the 134th running of the race, meaning fans can no longer bring their own beverages to the infield.
